headline: When Oil Falls but Exxon and Chevron Don’t
summary: Aggressive layoffs, efficiency gains, and exits from loss-making low-carbon ventures helped the five supermajors generate about $96 billion in free cash flow.

headline: Weak Oil Prices Loom: 3 Integrated Energy Stocks That Could Hold Up
summary: Rising demand for renewable energy is adding uncertainty to the Zacks Oil and Gas Integrated International industry's outlook. CVX, BP and PBR will probably overcome market challenges.

headline: Oil cools on Iran de-escalations, Talen's $3.45B gas acquisitions
summary: Market Catalysts Host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including oil stock (CL=F, BZ=F) reactions to de-escalations in US and Iran tensions, Talen Energy (TLN) making a $3.45 billion acquisition of natural gas assets from Energy Capital Partners, and Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) investing $200 million in Beast Industries. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Oil Sinks 4% as Iran Tensions Ease. Exxon, Chevron Stocks Drop Less Than You Might Think.
summary: Oil prices sank Thursday morning after President Donald Trump de-escalated tensions between Washington and Tehran saying “killing in Iran is stopping.”  Earlier this week, Trump also said he would impose a 25% tariff on any country doing business with Iran in the wake of deadly anti-government protests.  For now, the geopolitical risk premium, which had been supporting oil prices, appears to have tapered off.

For now, the geopolitical risk premium, which had been supporting oil prices, appears to have tapered off.

headline: Latest News In Energy Transition - Greenbacker Sells Solar Portfolio to Altus Power
summary: In the ongoing advancement of the energy transition, Greenbacker Renewable Energy Company LLC has executed a significant transaction by selling a 237-megawatt solar and storage portfolio to Altus Power. This sale, featuring over 100 projects across 18 states, aligns with Greenbacker's strategy to emphasize larger utility-scale projects that enhance efficiency and create long-term value within the renewable energy sector. This strategic move is part of Greenbacker’s broader effort to optimize...

headline: Oil Prices Fall Over 3% as  Iran Tensions Ease. How Exxon, Chevron Stocks Are Trading.
summary: Oil prices sank Thursday morning after President Donald Trump de-escalated tensions between Washington and Tehran saying “killing in Iran is stopping.”  Crude prices had been on a tear over the course of the five trading days ending Wednesday, as the Trump administration considered military action against the Islamic Republic.  Earlier this week, Trump also said he would impose a 25% tariff on any country doing business with Iran in the wake of deadly anti-government protests.

Earlier this week, Trump also said he would impose a 25% tariff on any country doing business with Iran in the wake of deadly anti-government protests.
